overview:
Mark has been with NeoCarta for 6 years and has served as board member, observer or advisor to multiple NeoCarta portfolio companies, including DBS, Handango, Massive, Sandburst and others. He has 15 years of experience in the technology industry where he has served in both operating and investing roles. Prior to NeoCarta, he worked for Highgate Ventures and GE Equity as an investor in software and technology infrastructure companies. Mark also worked for Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette where he focused on both public and private offerings for technology companies. He began his career at Oracle, in business development and finance.

Mark received his MBA from The Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania, where he graduated with Distinction; he also holds a BA in Economics from Stanford University. His outside interests include playing the drums, soccer and skiing.
